meanings.sent1: She mimeoed the important document for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The teacher mimeoed worksheets for the students.
meanings.sent3: The office mimeoed so many papers, they ran out of ink!
meanings.sent4: His memory mimeoed the image of her smile.
meanings.sent5: The mimeoed pages had a distinct purple color.

meanings.definition: Made copies using a mimeograph machine.
meanings.sent1: They mimeoed flyers to promote the event.
meanings.sent2: The secretary mimeoed the weekly newsletter.
meanings.sent3: The mimeoed copies were so crisp and clear.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter mimeoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The mimeoed papers had a nostalgic smell.
